方法详细信息

initGearInfo

private void initGearInfo()
Do some initialization work.

getCenterAlignBaseline

private int getCenterAlignBaseline(int H,
                                   Paint p)
Return the baseline of text Paint when align to H vertically

参数：
H - height to put text
p - text paint
返回：
baseline of text to be drawn within H

renderImageBuffer

private void renderImageBuffer()
Render image buffer and show buffer, then refresh layout and interface image buffer: a bitmap contains all the UI content show buffer: a bitmap which is a copied area of image buffer which is to be drawn on the UI canvas

gear2Index

private int gear2Index(GearInfo.GAER_ENUMS g)
Convert GAER_ENUMS value to inner index

参数：
g - GAER_ENUMS value
返回：
inner index

public void setAnimDuration(int d)

参数：

g - GAER_ENUMS value to be set

animateSwitchGear

public void animateSwitchGear(GearInfo.GAER_ENUMS g)
Switch current gear value and refresh the interface with an animation

参数：
g - GAER_ENUMS value to be set
